amendatorysection.para: Permit means an official document issued by a department or APHIS representative or an authorized accredited veterinarian that allows the interstate movement of animals under quarantine, such as exposed, noncompliant, infected, or source flock animals, whether the animals are high-risk, exposed, scrapie-positive, or scrapie-suspect. A seal may be required by the department or area veterinarian-in-charge.
